item.title: Narrated Boat Tours
item.description: Get an in-depth look at Providence from a boat cruise that travels along the waterways of Rhode Island’s capital city. Your guide shares live commentary about historical landmarks and modern destinations as you take in sites including the Fox Point Hurricane Barrier, Providence Industrial Harbor, Providence River, Waterplace Park and the pedestrian paths of Riverwalk. Choose a daytime or evening cruise, and feel free to bring your own refreshments on board.

image.alt: Narrated Boat Tours

item.title: Downcity Providence Food Tour
item.description: Learn why Providence is a foodie favorite with this 3-hour small group tour. Follow your professional guide to at least six tasting spots in the Downcity Arts District, a pedestrian-friendly area known for its charming architecture. Visit award-winning, high-end eateries like Gracie’s and Oberlin, as well as casual spots like an experimental bakery, Chinese bun shop, Greek emporium, and seafood shack.

image.alt: Downcity Providence Food Tour

item.title: Crime and Cuisine on Federal Hill
item.description:
A food tour with a felonious twist!
The Federal Hill neighborhood of Providence is one of its hottest destinations, home to some of the best Italian food in the world. This tour will give you a smorgasbord of its best bites and drinks, from fine wines to family recipes passed down through generations. Come hungry!
Every guest will also get a memento from their time on the Hill to take home with them. Spoiler alert: it's delicious!
The Hill was also home to some historic characters who dabbled on the wrong side of the law. Follow the intrigue of State v. Patriarca, when a future mayor took on a mob boss; learn about the corruption which brought Rhode Island's banking system to its knees in the '90s, and about a raid on an illegal dice game that sent a Providence Police Officer through a second-story window.
Guests under 21 will not be served alcohol on this tour.

image.alt: Crime and Cuisine on Federal Hill

item.title: Haunted History Walking Tour of Providence
item.description: Lift the veil on Providence’s dark history with this spooky walking tour through the storied College Hill neighborhood. Join your guide and small group for an eerie stroll past some of the city’s top landmarks as you learn about local legends and lore, unexplained mysteries, and the spirits that are said to roam the city still.

image.alt: Haunted History Walking Tour of Providence

item.title: Providence Ghosts Phantoms and Poltergeists Tour
item.description: Make your trip to Providence unforgettable with this 1-hour walking ghost tour. Let a local guide lead you down the city’s old streets and regale you with spooky tales of alleged hauntings and the darker side of Providence’s history. Whether you’re looking for a good scare or you just want to learn more about the city’s past, this tour should do the trick.

image.alt: Providence Ghosts Phantoms and Poltergeists Tour

item.title: Haunted Boat Tours
item.description: Enjoy a memorable way to explore Providence—and learn all of the city’s spookiest ghost stories and creepiest lore—on this after-dark boat tour. Make your own way to the dock, hop aboard your vessel, and set sail with Captain Peter. Your costumed guide, accompanied by flickering lanterns, will share stories and secrets as you cruise along the water and admire views of the city illuminated after dark.

image.alt: Haunted Boat Tours

item.title: Twilight River Cruises
item.description: See a new perspective on the Providence waterfront—and enjoy a romantic, one-of-a-kind evening activity—aboard this sunset cruise. Make your own way to the centrally located docks at Fox Point Marina, board the vessel, and set off as twilight descends. With music playing in the background, you can sip Rhode Island-made wine and prosecco, glimpse architectural highlights and landmarks, and savor the tranquil ambiance.

image.alt: Twilight River Cruises

item.title: Parasols and Pocket Watches: A History Tour
item.description:
Join us for this elegant stroll through time!
Allow our historically costumed, local guides to lead you down the most beautifully preserved street in all of Providence, RI- Benefit Street!
Guests will learn the history of some of Providence's most prominent residents and families, including the Dorr family, Roger Williams, and the Hoppin family. See architectural icons including the John Brown House, the First Baptist Church, the Fleur de Lys Building, and the original State House. Learn about the events that shaped our state and nation, including the suffrage movements (yes, there were two!) and the Civil War. This tour will leave you feeling more connected to the city's past and with a greater appreciation for Providence.
Benefit Street is a mostly flat street and is suitable for people of most levels of health and fitness.

image.alt: Parasols and Pocket Watches: A History Tour

item.title: Vineyard Voyages - Floating Wine Tasting
item.description: Cruise the Providence River as you sample a selection of beverages from a Rhode Island winery on this wine-tasting boat tour. Your captain will share information about downtown Providence landmarks while you savor and discuss six different wines. Experienced oenophiles and those new to wine-tasting can both enjoy this fun and festive twist on a sightseeing tour.

image.alt: Vineyard Voyages - Floating Wine Tasting

item.title: Father's Day Boat Rides
item.description:
Celebrate Dad with a Memorable Father's Day Cruise!
Make this Father’s Day unforgettable with a narrated tour along the picturesque Providence River! Perfect for the whole family, this special outing is a fun and unique way to celebrate Dad.
Family-friendly fun! All ages welcome. BYOB to toast Dad your way Unique river views and engaging narration from our Captains!
Seats are limited — book now for an unforgettable Father's Day celebration!

image.alt: Father's Day Boat Rides

item.title: Voices of Resilience: Hidden History of Providence Tour
item.description: From pivotal social justice movements to the personal narratives of unsung heroes, Voices of Resilience offers a deeper understanding of Providence’s identity and legacy of courage, resistance, and triumph. We'll take a closer look at how Rhode Island's tremendous profit on the international slave trade powered the Industrial Revolution, how the state barely overcame revolution in defiance of rebellious suffragists, all the way through how the state fought but failed to prevent the first Gay Pride parade from taking place in Providence in 1976. ​ Providence has been home to diverse, courageous, and resilient people who were able to achieve incredible feats despite the deck being stacked against them in every way. Learn about Edward Bannister, a 19th-century Black barber who overcame prejudice to become a painter of national acclaim; Princess Red Wing, a Narragansett and Pokanoket activist; and the 1902 labor strike that stopped Rhode Island's urban core in its tracks.

image.alt: Voices of Resilience: Hidden History of Providence Tour

item.title: Private Departure Transfer to Providence TF Green Airport PVD
item.description: Forget about fighting traffic and looking for a parking spot at TF Green Airport (PVD). Skip all the headaches associated with getting to the airport and travel with confidence by booking a private transfer. Choose from a three-person sedan or a five-passenger SUV. Then sit back and relax on the drive from any Newport, Providence, Warwick, Smithfield, North Kingstown or Bristol accommodation to the airport.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer to Providence TF Green Airport PVD

item.title: Providence Architecture Boat Tour
item.description: Take a boat tour along the Providence waterways to discover 300 years of architectural history. Led by the Providence Preservation Society, uncover the city's stories, sight lines, and subtle details. From iconic landmarks to hidden gems, witness historic Providence from the best vantage point in town.

image.alt: Providence Architecture Boat Tour

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Providence Adventure
item.description: Goodbye, drab walking tours and crowded museums. Hello, exploring Providence with your crew via photo scavenger hunt. With just your wits and teamwork (and your smartphone leading the way), you’ll explore this historic town by snapping hilarious photos, solving puzzles, completing challenges, and racking up points. As you wander, you’ll learn about Providence’s past and present—and you might taste victory, too.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Providence Adventure

item.title: Dark Tales: The Haunted Authors of Providence Tour
item.description:
Walk through Providence's dark side!
The eerie writings H.P. Lovecraft- one of the most significant supernatural horror fiction authors of the 20th century- are inexplicably bound to his hometown of Providence. This tour walks in the tortured author's footsteps through his traumatic upbringing and favorite haunts; guests also meet some of the fictional characters that Lovecraft wrote into the city's fabric through dramatic retellings of his creepiest tales.
But Lovecraft isn't the only author that ambled the city's centuries-old sidewalks: Sarah Helen Whitman was an eccentric local spiritualist and poet who was briefly engaged to master of the macabre Edgar Allan Poe. This tour also explores her life and relives the couple's whirlwind- and doomed- romance.

image.alt: Dark Tales: The Haunted Authors of Providence Tour

item.title: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Providence RI
item.description:
Step into the shoes of a newly-minted detective, tasked by Commander Mahoney to solve a gripping case... murder on the streets of Providence.
Throughout this crime-solving audio adventure, visit each of the 10 mapped locations. You'll have the option to explore the downtown area using the Walking Map or follow a Driving Map on the city's outskirts. Once you choose, the exact starting point will be revealed. *See images for route.
Park or stop at each location, listen to the audio story, and put your detective skills to the test by gathering clues and piecing together the evidence. Finally, make your deductions and issue an arrest warrant.
Your overall detective skills will be evaluated, culminating in a Case Performance Score to measure your sleuthing prowess. This game is suitable for solo detectives, dynamic duos, or groups of mystery enthusiasts, offering an immersive audio tale filled with intrigue.

image.alt: Murder Mystery Detective Experience in Providence RI

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Providence by Wacky Walks
item.description: Discover a new way to explore a city with this app-led scavenger hunt in Providence, Rhode Island. After downloading the app, complete challenges to find objects all over the city, taking in the sights and earning points as you go. Your goal is to find all the items on the list, and possibly complete bonus challenges, to win the game and compete against other teams.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Providence by Wacky Walks

Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.

item.title: Scavenger Hunt in Providence by Operation City Quest
item.description: Get to know Providence better on a fun two-hour scavenger hunt adventure. Collect objects and perform challenges to earn points while having fun with your family or friends. You’ll see the sights of Providence and learn more about the city while getting active. An ideal adventure for team-building activities with co-workers.

image.alt: Scavenger Hunt in Providence by Operation City Quest

Your driver will be waiting for you at a scheduled time and you will travel comfortably to your destination.
Our transfers will provide you with such services: meeting with a name plate, door-to-door delivery, no hidden fees, clean cars and professional drivers, which will make your trip more comfortable and safe. We guarantee the quality of the services provided.

item.title: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Providence with Holly Jolly Hunt
item.description: Holly Jolly Hunt is a scavenger hunt that is played using an app on your smartphone, that brings your entire family and friends together for holiday cheer. During the adventure you’ll be seeking out all the traditional, and even the non-traditional holiday items we all see this time of year around the city. You’ll get points for each item you find. The goal is to capture as many items as you can in order to score as many points as possible and get 1st place on the leaderboard. Along the way you’ll be asked to perform silly holiday themed tasks meant to bring laughter and smiles to everyone involved. Come play with us. Young or old, this is a scavenger hunt for everyone that enjoys this time of year. We promise you will create holiday memories that you will not forget! Holly Jolly Hunt can be played in any city!

image.alt: Celebrate with a Holiday Scavenger Hunt in Providence with Holly Jolly Hunt

item.title: T. F. Green State Airport (PVD) to Providence – Arrival Private Transfer
item.description: This one-way transfer service will get you and your group from T.F. Green State Airport (PVD) to Providence hassle free. You won’t need to deal with taxis or public transportation. Just find your driver at the designated spot, then relax in your private vehicle to your destination.
